title: MOTION (LEE - JURADO) relative to funding for sustaining the Handyworker Program's activities within Council District (CD) 12.

appearances.recommendation: TRANSFER and APPROPRIATE $75,600 in the AB 1290 Fund No. 53P, Account No. 281212 (CD 12 Redevelopment Projects- Services), to the Affordable Housing Trust Fund No. 44G, Account No. 43C588, to serve CD 12's Handyworker Program waitlist. AUTHORIZE the City Clerk and/ or the Los Angeles Housing Department to make any corrections, clarifications or revisions to the above fund transfer instructions, including any corrections and changes to fund or account numbers; said corrections, clarifications or changes may be made orally, electronically or by any other means. Motion (Lee - Jurado) dated 10-22-25
